targets.query:
from(bucket: "climate-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metadata" and r["script"] == "gsoy_importer")
  |> last(column: "last_run")

from(bucket: "climate-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Extreme_Maximum_Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["country_iso"] == "${country_iso}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _measurement: "Maximum Temperature" }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "" }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with country_iso: "" }))
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "climate-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Extreme_Minimum_Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["country_iso"] == "${country_iso}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: min, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _measurement: "Minimum Temperature" }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "" }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with country_iso: "" }))
  |> yield(name: "min")

from(bucket: "climate-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Maximum_Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["country_iso"] == "${country_iso}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _measurement: "Maximum Temperature" }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "" }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with country_iso: "" }))
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "climate-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Average_Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["country_iso"] == "${country_iso}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _measurement: "Average Temperature" }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "" }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with country_iso: "" }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "climate-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Minimum_Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: min, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _measurement: "Minimum Temperature" }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "" }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with country_iso: "" }))
  |> yield(name: "min")

from(bucket: "climate-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Total_Precipitation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["country_iso"] == "${country_iso}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _measurement: "Precipitation" }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "" }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with country_iso: "" }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "climate-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Extreme_Maximum_Precipitation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(bucket: "climate-bucket", tag: "country_iso", start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
list.label: Country ISO
list.name: country_iso
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(bucket: "climate-bucket", tag: "country_iso", start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
